Data: Hosein to Carey, 1 wide good length ball grips and turns sharply from middle down the leg side, wide called.
Hosein to Carey, 2 wide another good length ball on middle rips down the leg side past a forward prod, beats Hope this time behind the stumps and they run one in addition to the extra.
Hosein to Henriques, no run good length ball on fourth stump, prods forward to defend.
Hosein to Henriques, 1 run good length ball on fifth stump, goes after the width and slaps this through point.
Hosein to Carey, no run full on off, sweeps this straight to short fine leg.
Hosein to Carey, no run good length ball on fourth stump, awkward sweep short picks out fine leg again, lucky it wasn't a top edge. Nowhere near sweeping length.

Hosein to Carey, OUT Carey looked uncomfortable all over long to Hosein and finally comes undone! Hosein tosses this up with more flight full on fifth stump to encourage a drive against the turn to mid-off, but he's been getting sharp turn all over and Carey doesn't get to the pitch. Unsurprisingly he pays the price as the ball rips past the inside edge of the attempted drive, through the gate and crashes into middle stum

Hosein to Turner, no run short on sixth stump, it sticks in the pitch and turns, Turner slightly ahead of the shot slapping this uppishly but into a gap between backward point and cover before it is fielded.
Walsh to Henriques, no run good length ball on fourth stump, defended.
Walsh to Henriques, no run flighted full on middle and off at 79 kph, smothered on the front foot.
Walsh to Henriques, 1 run short on leg stump, Henriques pulls flat to deep backward square for one.

Walsh to Turner, 1 run low full toss on middle, chipped uppishly toward Pollard at short midwicket, he's slow diving to his left and it goes underneath his outstretched arms through to deep midwicket for one.
Walsh to Henriques, 1 run full on the stumps, defended on the front foot again.
Walsh to Turner, no run googly on fourth stump, Turner goes back to defend, inside edges this in between his legs and caroms off the left leg through to Hope, very lucky to have missed leg stump.
Hosein to Henriques, no run short and wide, slaps this to cover, Jason Mohammed on the ring.

Hosein to Henriques, OUT edge to slip! Hosein once again slows it down and flights it more getting the just rewards. This one is on sixth stump on a full length, Henriques gropes at this well away from his body in awkward fashion with a cross bat swipe and the extra bounce plus sharp turn has it fly off a thick edge to Holder at rib height moving to his right at slip.
Hosein to Wade, 1 leg bye good length ball on the legs, spins down the leg side off the pads and given as a leg bye.

Hosein to Turner, OUT Hosein is ripping through this entire order with the sharp turn on offer! He was bowling his first handful of deliveries in the 90-94 kph range but slows this up at 86 kph and once more is rewarded. Turner gropes forward at this good length ball on leg stump and it rips past the outside edge to clatter the top of off!
Hosein to Starc, 1 run full on fourth stump, driven to cover.
Hosein to Wade, no run full on the legs, goes to sweep and smothers this into the ground.
Walsh to Starc, no run full on fourth stump, driven to extra cover.
Walsh to Starc, no run good length ball on fourth stump turns in sharply, defended on the back foot back to Walsh Jr
Walsh to Starc, no run googly lands full on leg stump, Starc defends awkwardly and a thick edge goes to backward point.
Walsh to Starc, 1 run full toss on the hips, flicked to deep backward square.

Walsh to Wade, no run flighted on a good length on off stump, Wade goes to play a paddle sweep and there looks like a deflection. He's overstretching badly and Hope appeals for a stumping but really it looked like he gloved it. Given not out. They appeal for DRS! I think this may be overturned. They look at the stumping appeal first and Wade just has his toe behind the line. On reflection it may have passed his glove and
Walsh to Wade, no run short on the stumps, flicked to midwicket.
Hosein to Starc, no run plays back and defends
Hosein to Starc, 1 wide pushed down the leg side, Starc misses his flick
Hosein to Starc, no run almost bowled through the gate again! Tossed up outside off, encourages the drive from Starc and it spins past the inside edge
Hosein to Starc, 1 leg bye pops up in the air over leg slip, but there's no bat involved
Hosein to Wade, 1 wide starts a touch too straight this time and turns down the leg side
Hosein to Wade, no run goes onto the back foot and whips to Pollard at short leg
Hosein to Wade, no run fuller outside off, Wade lunges forward with bat and pad, spins and takes an inside edge
Hosein to Wade, 2 runs goes deep in the crease and whips down the ground, splits the gap between long-on and deep midwicket
Walsh to Starc, no run length ball outside off, driven to backward point
Walsh to Starc, no run zips past the outside edge as Starc plays back to a leg-break outside off
Walsh to Starc, no run worked off the pads into midwicket
Walsh to Starc, 2 runs short on leg stump, pulled around the corner and Bravo is just able to get there
Walsh to Starc, 1 wide down the leg side
Walsh to Starc, 1 run very full outside off, drags it down the ground to long-on
Walsh to Wade, 1 run gets forward and drives a full delivery to long-off
Hosein to Wade, 1 run short of a length outside off, pops this in the air into midwicket but quite safe
Hosein to Starc, (no ball) more sharp spin...turns back between bat and pad, loops in the air and is taken one-handed at slip. It's a no-ball
Hosein to Starc, 2 runs gets this full at the stumps, driven down to long-on and a fumble makes sure the second is comfortable
Hosein to Starc, no run pushes forward well away from his body, grips and takes a thick inside edge
Hosein to Starc, no run full and driven firmly back at the bowler who deflects it into the non-striker's stumps...Wade got his foot back
Hosein to Starc, no run big appeal and given lbw...but Starc reviews straightaway. This looked to have hit him outside off stump. Yep, Starc survives
Hosein to Starc, 1 run driven down to long-off
Joseph to Starc, no run full outside off, left alone
Joseph to Starc, no run back of a length outside off, pushed square into the covers
Joseph to Starc, 1 run fuller, Starc pushing at it without much footwork, runs off a thick inside edge
Joseph to Wade, no run beats the edge of a booming drive, full outside off, good pace as well from Joseph
Joseph to Wade, no run good length at off stump, defended to backward point
Joseph to Wade, 1 run another big drive from Wade, this it takes a big outside edge and flies to third man
Hosein to Wade, 1 run full at the stumps, flicked down the ground
Hosein to Starc, no run small stride forward and defends
Hosein to Starc, 1 run touch shorter and straight, worked through midwicket
Hosein to Wade, FOUR runs reverse sweeps a wide delivery outside off, Holder anticipates from slip but it's wide of him
Hosein to Wade, no run gets forward and defends from outside off
Hosein to Wade, no run big shout for lbw as Wade misses his flick to leg but looks outside off stump again
Joseph to Starc, no run back of a length and slides past the outside edge
Joseph to Starc, no run a shorter delivery, goes for the pull and doesn't connect
Joseph to Starc, FOUR runs middles this one! That made a good sound off the bat. Pulls from outside off through midwicket
Joseph to Starc, no run angled across outside off, left alone
Joseph to Starc, FOUR runs another handsome shot from Starc! Drives through the line of a length delivery at off stump and sends it straight down the ground
Joseph to Starc, no run angled across outside off, left alone
Hosein to Wade, 1 run drags this from wide outside off down to long-on
Hosein to Starc, no run a strangled appeal for lbw, that may have taken inside edge onto the back leg. Actually was turning down leg side
Hosein to Starc, no run forward and defends
Hosein to Starc, no run good stride forward and plays with bat and pad together
Hosein to Starc, 1 wide spins down the leg side
Hosein to Starc, no run touch flatter outside off, defended to cover
Hosein to Starc, no run fuller at off stump, blocked on the front foot
Cottrell to Wade, 2 runs short and wide outside off, square drives through the covers wide of the sweeper
Cottrell to Wade, no run short of a length outside off, goes for the pull and is beaten on the under edge
Cottrell to Wade, no run back of a length at off stump, defended
Cottrell to Wade, 1 run hops behind a shorter delivery and angles it down to third man
Cottrell to Starc, no run full and straight, 137kph, worked to midwicket
Cottrell to Starc, no run length ball at off stump, defended to mid-on
Walsh to Wade, no run slides across outside off and beats the top edge of an attempted cut
Walsh to Wade, no run full at middle, defended
Walsh to Wade, no run worked off his hip to short fine leg
Walsh to Wade, 1 run drives a full delivery down to long-on
Walsh to Starc, no run plays back and pushes into the covers
Walsh to Starc, no run misses the sweep, an appeal for lbw but looked as though that pitched outside leg
Cottrell to Wade, 1 wide pushed well down the leg side
Cottrell to Wade, no run full at off stump, driven crisply to mid-off
Cottrell to Wade, no run back of a length at middle and off, defended to cover
Cottrell to Wade, no run short outside off, climbs over the top edge as Wade aims to go square
Cottrell to Wade, FOUR runs ends up doing very well with this, the delivery rushed onto him but he was able to deflect it through the vacant slip area fine of third man
Cottrell to Wade, no run full outside off, left alone
Cottrell to Wade, 1 wide very short on off stump, well over Wade's head
Cottrell to Wade, 1 run short of a length, gets inside the line and nudges to the leg side
Walsh to Wade, no run left alone outside off
Walsh to Wade, no run fuller at middle and off, plays forward
Walsh to Wade, no run low full toss is driven to mid-off
Walsh to Wade, no run steps back to leg stump and drives into the off side
Walsh to Wade, 1 run worked off the pads backward of square
Walsh to Starc, no run what a ripper! Almost cleaned up by a googly...Starc playing forward, pitches around leg stump and spins past the edge. Not far from off stump, either
Cottrell to Wade, no run good length, straight, defended to the covers
Cottrell to Wade, no run back of a length, pushed to the off side
Cottrell to Wade, 1 run aims to work this to the on side but gets a leading edge into the covers
Cottrell to Starc, no run full and straight, pushed to midwicket
Cottrell to Starc, 1 run short and pulled strongly to deep midwicket
Cottrell to Wade, 1 run full outside leg stump, flicked down to long leg. Brings up the fifty stand
Walsh to Wade, no run full outside leg stump, worked to midwicket
Walsh to Wade, 1 run a googly, opens the face into backward point

Walsh to Starc, OUT big appeal for lbw, it's a long, long appeal...Joel Wilson says not out and Pollard calls the review. Starc sweeping, struck on the back leg. This looks pretty close. And it's hitting the top of middle stump
Walsh to Zampa, no run beaten by a googly first up as he plays forward, takes the pad
Walsh to Zampa, no run full at middle, blocked
Walsh to Zampa, 1 run full outside off, Zampa drives and it skews off an inside edge to the leg side
Hosein to Zampa, no run length ball, defended to cover
Hosein to Zampa, no run defended off the stumps to the man at bat pad
Hosein to Zampa, no run turn and bounce! Pitches around leg stump, straightens, pops off Zampa's gloves but wide of silly point
Hosein to Zampa, no run driven to cover
Hosein to Zampa, 2 runs full toss at the pads, clipped through midwicket
Hosein to Zampa, no run presses forward and plays back to the bowler
Walsh to Wade, no run pushed across outside off, left alone
Walsh to Wade, 1 run fuller at middle, turned off the pads into midwicket
Walsh to Zampa, no run length outside off, played with an open face to backward point
Walsh to Zampa, no run nice drift onto middle and leg, defends coming forward
Walsh to Zampa, 1 run full outside off, driven down the ground
Walsh to Wade, no run taps a full delivery to the off side
Hosein to Zampa, no run beaten! Sharp turn at 91 kph landing this on a good length on middle and leg and spins past Zampa's back foot defense.
Hosein to Zampa, no run fuller on middle, defended this time off the middle of the bat to cover.
Hosein to Zampa, 1 run very very full on off, blunted to long-off.
Hosein to Wade, no run full and flat on fifth stump, smothered into the ground on the front foot by Wade.
Hosein to Wade, no run full on off stump, plays around his pads as this one spins sharply into the pads and lobs up toward short fine leg.
Hosein to Wade, 1 run good length ball on fifth stump, Wade shuffles across to chip this past the non-striker to long-on.
Walsh to Wade, no run short and wide, Wade leaves it alone after initially shaping to cut.
Walsh to Wade, no run good length ball on fifth stump, taps this with soft hands but picks out backward point.
Walsh to Wade, 1 run good length ball on off stump, taps this again with soft hands but this time places it wider of backward point to find a single.
Walsh to Zampa, FOUR runs fuller and wider on seventh stump, plenty of width for Zampa to chase after this and crunches a drive through extra cover and just has enough steam to get to the rope.
Walsh to Zampa, 1 run strays down the leg side with a flighted full delivery, Zampa hammers a sweep but picks out Lewis at deep backward square who tumbles right to cut it off for a single.
Walsh to Wade, 1 run good length ball on middle, Wade goes deep in his crease to tap with soft hands in front of point for a single.
Mohammed to Wade, no run good length ball on off, turns sharply and defended.
Mohammed to Wade, no run another good length ball on off, slower turn this time and defended to point.
Mohammed to Wade, 2 runs good length ball on sixth stump, enough width to cut this through the covers for a pair.
Mohammed to Wade, no run good length ball on fourth stump, defended to point.
Mohammed to Wade, 1 run flighted full on fourth stump, driven in the air toward long-off.
Mohammed to Zampa, 1 run short on fifth stump, punches this uppishly but safely wide of cover.
Hosein to Zampa, 2 runs flighted full on off, Zampa pokes forward and edges it wide of slip through third man for a pair.
Hosein to Zampa, no run full and flat on leg stump, straightens but smothered on the front foot by Zampa.
Hosein to Zampa, no run flighted more full on middle, drives this off a thick edge to cover.
Hosein to Zampa, no run full on off, driven to extra cover.
Hosein to Zampa, no run good length ball at 94 kph on off stump spins sharply past the edge poking away from his body.
Hosein to Zampa, no run full on off, prods forward, thick edge goes along the ground to backward point.
Mohammed to Wade, no run short on fifth stump, punched to extra cover.
Mohammed to Wade, 3 runs short on fifth stump, backs away to cut through cover, Cottrell has a long way to go from point sweeper and can't stop a third on a relay.
Mohammed to Zampa, no run good length ball on fifth stump spins in slowly and is defended with ease.
Mohammed to Zampa, 1 run full on middle and leg, flicked through midwicket for one.
Mohammed to Wade, no run premeditates a reverse sweep to a full ball on fourth stump, but Wade misses as the ball straightens too much and just misses off stump.
Mohammed to Wade, no run this time he connects on the reverse sweep hitting with the spin but sends it straight to short third man.
Hosein to Zampa, no run good length ball on off, defended.
Hosein to Zampa, no run full on off, smothered on the front foot.
Hosein to Zampa, no run full on middle, defended to cover.
Hosein to Zampa, 2 runs full on the legs, chips this in the air into a big gap at midwicket for a pair.
Hosein to Zampa, no run full on off, smokes a drive into Pollard's thigh under a helmet at silly mid-off.
Hosein to Zampa, no run what a leave! Zampa trusts that this will spin and it does as a good length ball lands on fourth stump and straightens past off to howls from Hope and Pollard.
Mohammed to Wade, 1 run short outside off, slapped through cover for a long single.
Mohammed to Zampa, no run short and wide, slapped to cover.
Mohammed to Zampa, no run good length ball on off stump, defended.
Mohammed to Zampa, no run good length ball on off stump, smothered on the front foot.
Mohammed to Zampa, no run flighted more on a fullish length on off, smothered again on the front foot.
Mohammed to Zampa, 2 runs strays down the leg side, swept firmly behind square, Cottrell cuts it off at deep backward square to turn four into two.
Joseph to Wade, no run overpitched on sixth stump at 136 kph, firm drive straight to extra cover.
Joseph to Wade, 1 run good length ball on the hips, flicked to deep fine leg.
Joseph to Zampa, no run full on middle and leg at 129 kph, defended to midwicket.
Joseph to Zampa, no run full on off stump at 136 kph, defended to midwicket.
Joseph to Zampa, no run full on middle, flicked to midwicket.
Joseph to Zampa, no run full on middle, flicked to Pollard at a very very short midwicket. No helmet on.
Mohammed to Wade, no run flighted wide on seventh stump, Wade tries an almighty slog sweep across the line but is out in front of another slow turning delivery.
Mohammed to Wade, no run good length ball bowled flatter and straighter on middle, defended.
Mohammed to Wade, 1 leg bye good length ball on middle, Wade pokes forward and misses as it spins into the thigh and goes to third man for a leg bye.
Mohammed to Zampa, no run good length ball spins sharply from fifth stump into the pads to beat a forward prod, stifled lbw shout as it was turning well down leg.
Mohammed to Zampa, 1 wide full down leg side, goes to sweep and misses. Wide called.
Mohammed to Zampa, no run good length ball on fifth stump, little turn this time, soft jab to cover.
Mohammed to Zampa, no run full on the legs, misses a flick off the pads and it trickles adjacent to the keeper.

Joseph to Wade, OUT soft soft dismissal. Wade is gutted! Full in the slot on sixth stump at 133 kph, a hit me ball and Wade does so but fails to elevate this in his effort to shovel it over the ring. Pooran reaches up above his head on the circle at extra cover to intercept this with ease. Wade drops to a knee after realizing he's thrown it away after doing so much hard work to dig Australia out of trouble.
Joseph to Agar, no run back of a length ball on the stumps, defended on the back foot.
Joseph to Agar, 1 run back of a length wider on fifth stump at 129 kph, Agar guides this with an open face to deep third man.

Joseph to Zampa, 1 run nearly another wicket! Short on the legs, tame pull flutters over Pooran leaping at short backward square leg standing 10 yards inside the ring. If he was on the ring it was a straightforward catch but instead eludes him for one.
Joseph to Agar, 1 run full on sixth stump, flat-footed swipe at this and a thick edge flies to third man.

Joseph to Zampa, FOUR runs another close shave! Full in the slot at 137 kph on fourth stump, carbon copy ball that snared Wade with a loose drive. Zampa shovels this one in almost identical fashion toward extra cover akin to Wade but he gets under it just enough to clear Cottrell on the ring and it bounces away for four.
Cottrell to Agar, no run full on middle, driven to mid-off.
Cottrell to Agar, no run yorker on middle, jammed out to cover.
Cottrell to Agar, no run back of a length on leg stump at 139 kph, hops back to defend back to Cottrell.
Cottrell to Agar, FOUR runs hello! Length ball at 139 kph follows Agar backing away from leg stump but not enough to cramp him for room and he swipes this pull over midwicket for a boundary.
Cottrell to Agar, no run backs away from leg stump a touch but defends this full ball on middle with a firm forward push.
Cottrell to Agar, 1 run good length ball on off, prods away from his body defensively and a thick edge goes to ground through backward point for one.
Joseph to Agar, no run back of a length on off, defended to backward point.
Joseph to Agar, no run good length ball on off, defended again.

Joseph to Agar, 2 runs nearly a catch at extra cover! Pitched up on off stump to encourage a drive, Agar obliges with an uppish heave toward Mohammed in the covers to his left, he leaps but it's just out of reach and goes away for two.

Joseph to Agar, FOUR runs very very poor from Cottrell at mid-off. Full ball on middle, punched firmly to Cottrell, he attacks it from mid-off trying to deny what would've been a comfortable single and a matador red cape effort bending very tamely to try to pick it up turns the ball into a boundary.
Joseph to Agar, 2 runs another overpitched ball on off, driven firmly along the ground wide of Mohammed in the covers for another pair.
Joseph to Agar, 1 run back of a length ball on off at 142 kph, guides this behind point and they scamper for another single.
Walsh to Agar, 1 run short on off at 83 kph, goes back to hack through to deep midwicket.
Walsh to Zampa, no run good length on fourth stump, turns sharply away and tapped to cover.
Walsh to Zampa, 2 runs short on fifth stump, spins away further and slapped off the toe over cover for a pair.
Walsh to Zampa, no run good length ball on fifth stump, left alone.
Walsh to Zampa, no run short on fifth stump, slapped to backward point.
Walsh to Zampa, no run flighted full on off to encourage a slog across the line, inside edge into the ground before it caroms off the leg of Zampa.
Cottrell to Agar, no run length ball tailing into off stump at 130 kph, Agar slaps this to backward point.
Cottrell to Agar, 2 runs length ball on fifth stump, cross batted swipe back down the ground to long-off and they take a pair.
Cottrell to Agar, no run back of a length ball follows Agar backing away from leg again, defended back to Cottrell.
Cottrell to Agar, no run back of a length again at 136 kph trying to follow Agar backing away, beats his awkward back foot poke.
Cottrell to Agar, no run back of a length on off, guides this to backward point while backing away.
Cottrell to Agar, no run another back of a length ball, another relatively trouble free defensive stab...
Holder to Zampa, no run short on off stump, Zampa defends awkwardly off the gloves to point.
Holder to Zampa, 1 run back of a length on off, punched to the cover sweeper.
Holder to Agar, 1 run short on the body, swipes this into the ground to deep midwicket.

Holder to Zampa, FOUR runs short ball on the body follows him backing away, top edge sails over short fine leg, nobody in place for a catch either on the ring or on the rope, and it bounces away easily for a boundary.
Holder to Zampa, no run back of a length on middle, defended.
Holder to Zampa, no run thigh high full toss on leg stump, Zampa backs away and swats back toward mid-off.
Walsh to Agar, no run short outside off, slapped to extra cover.
Walsh to Agar, 1 run flighted full and wide on seventh stump, reaches out to slog sweep this and it comes off the toe before fluttering well short of deep square leg.
Walsh to Zampa, 1 run overpitched on seventh stump, flat drive to the cover sweeper.
Walsh to Agar, 1 run flighted full on sixth stump, drive to Cottrell at wide long-off for one.

Walsh to Zampa, FOUR runs reverse sweep! And connects beautifully! Premeditated this to a full ball on middle, cracks it off the meat of thebat and sends it wide of backward point to the rope. That was a shot of a top-class batsman.
Walsh to Zampa, no run short and wide, slapped to extra cover on the ring.
Holder to Agar, FOUR runs attempted yorker winds up as an overpitched delivery on leg stump, Agar backs away and smashes a drive through mid-off to the rope.

Holder to Agar, SIX runs hello! Shot of the innings?! After backing away from leg stump almost every time in his first 27 balls, Agar shuffles way outside off stump and flicks a full ball on fourth stump flat over backward square leg for an audacious six!
Holder to Agar, 1 run yorker on middle, dug out in front of point for one.
Holder to Zampa, 1 run yorker again on middle, dug out to long-on.
Holder to Agar, no run yorker again on the stumps, defended.
Holder to Agar, 1 run yorker on leg stump, backs away from leg to dig it out to cover sweeper.

Cottrell to Agar, SIX runs Agar is rallying Australia into a winning position! Cottrell spears this in full on fourth stump at 134 kph, Agar backs away and cracks a drive high and deep over wide long-off.
Cottrell to Agar, no run full and wide ball outside off, left alone by Agar, and it was well inside the guidelines.
Cottrell to Agar, no run full length on seventh stump, Agar hacks at this and is beaten.
Cottrell to Agar, 1 run back of a length on middle, Agar backs away to cut behind point for one.
Cottrell to Zampa, no run wide yorker, Zampa shuffles way outside off and tries to jam it out but is beaten.

Cottrell to Zampa, OUT yorker finally cleans up Zampa. Full on the stumps at 130 kph, Zampa backs away to heave over cover and misses, off stump is uprooted. Cottrell gives a very tame and frustrated salute, almost in disgust that they've allowed this stand to last for as long as it has. Zampa has played an incredibly valuable hand and the West Indies know it.

Joseph to Agar, OUT you wait all day for a bus and then two come at once! Joseph firest this in full and a yard outside leg stump following Agar backing way away from the stumps. Agar tries to flick over square leg but gets a leading edge that balloons over point. Lewis takes a catch backpedaling from the ring.

West Indies were in front for the majority of the innings but heading into the break it is Australia who look like favorites to come out of this match with 10 valuable points on the World Cup Super League points table because the West Indies are facing a tricky target on a crumbling wicket. Stay with us for the start of the chase in a bit.

6.07 pm From 45 for 6, and on a pitch that was turning viciously, I don't think anyone could have foreseen such a resilient recovery. Hosein ends with 3 for 30, but that somehow feels incredibly unsatisfying and underwhelming considering the fact that he had figures of 3 for 5 after two overs at 45 for 6 on a pitch giving him all the assistance he could dream of. What a fightback by the Australia lower-order, including a pair of
Chase ready to begin. Starc has the new ball over the wicket to Lewis. Hope off strike. Two slips in place.
Starc to Lewis, no run back of a length ball into the hips, can't flick it away.
Starc to Lewis, no run full outswinger on fifth stump at 148 kph, left alone.

Starc to Lewis, no run oh baby! What a ball! Or was it?! Full outswinger on off stump nips away and there's a deflection as it passes Lewis. Big appeal upheld but Lewis reviews it immediately. Replays show it passed the bat and came off the thigh. Third decision overturned so far tonight, all of them by Joel Wilson. A DRS hat-trick...
Starc to Lewis, no run good length on off, defended.
Starc to Lewis, 1 leg bye full on the legs, clipped into square leg after a missed flick. Leg bye signaled.
Starc to Hope, no run full on fifth stump at 147 kph, Hope leaves it alone.
Agar to Lewis, no run short ball outside off, left alone.
Agar to Lewis, 1 run short and wide, slashes at this and sends a thick edge that flies short of deep third man.
Agar to Hope, no run good length ball on off stump, defended.
Agar to Hope, 1 run good length ball on fifth stump at 140 kph, tapped with an open face and soft hands to deep third man to get off strike.
Agar to Lewis, no run short and wide, slaps this to cover, diving stop on the ring.

Agar to Lewis, (no ball) 4 leg byes back of a length on the hips, goes to pull and misses, comes off the thigh guard and deflects wide of the keeper for four leg byes. Nigel Duguid now signals a no ball too as the third umpire radios down that Agar has overstepped, and replays show by a good three inches too.
Agar to Lewis, no run length ball on fifth stump, Lewis swings for the moon and misses.
Starc to Hope, no run inswinger full on the stumps at 145 kph, defended back to Starc.
Starc to Hope, 1 run full on fourth stump, Lewis goes to drive and inside edges this past leg stump to deep fine leg.
Starc to Lewis, no run good length ball on fourth stump, beats Lewis prodding down the wrong line.

Starc to Lewis, no run good length inswinger on fourth stump, Lewis shoulders arms and is hit on the knee. Huge appeal given not out. It looked worse than it was. Australia opt against a review, wisely. It was not coming back to hit the stumps.
Starc to Lewis, 1 wide inswinging yorker wide down leg, extra signaled.
Starc to Bravo, 1 wide full and down leg at 143 kph, Starc will have another bonus ball to bowl.
Agar to Hope, no run back of a length on the stumps, tries to flick off his hips and misses off the pads.
Agar to Hope, 1 wide full ball down leg, another extra added to the total.
Agar to Hope, FOUR runs overpitched outside off stump, Hope leans forward and times a drive through the covers.
Agar to Hope, no run full on sixth stump, left alone.
Agar to Hope, 1 run full outside off at 133 kph, drives hard at this and slices a thick edge high and wide of deep third man for one.
Agar to Mohammed, no run full outside off, defended.
Agar to Mohammed, no run good length ball on off, defended to mid-off.
Starc to Hope, 1 wide short and wide outside off, Hope chases after this and misses. Wide called. Hope may ask Wilson to rescind that call. It means one more delivery having to face Starc!
Starc to Hope, 1 run full inswinger on the legs at 148 kph, goes to flick to midwicket, way out in front and a leading edge goes wide of backward point. Hope scampers off strike as fast as he can.
Starc to Mohammed, 1 run yorker on fifth stump at 149 kph, stabs this out in front of point and he settles for a long single.
Starc to Hope, no run good length ball moves away off the pitch and Hope plays at this away from his body, inside edge goes into the leg side.
Starc to Hope, no run back of a length ball on fourth stump at 143 kph, Hope hops up to tap this down.
Starc to Hope, FOUR runs full and wide at 149 kph, almost on the wide guidelines and Hope reaches out to flay this high over extra cover speeding away to the rope.
Starc to Hope, no run back of a length on sixth stump, slapped to cover on the ring, tumbling stop.
Agar to Mohammed, no run full on off stump, chipped out to midwicket.
Agar to Mohammed, no run good length ball on off stump, defended to midwicket.
Agar to Mohammed, FOUR runs overpitched on sixth stump at 139 kph, Mohammed latches on and creams this through extra cover to the rope.
Agar to Mohammed, 2 runs half-volley on fourth stump, uppish drive into the gap in the covers but not timed that well and dribbles short of the rope for a pair.
Agar to Mohammed, FOUR runs low full toss on fifth stump at shin height, Mohammed shovels this wide of mid-off. Freebie from Agar seized on with ease.
Agar to Mohammed, no run good length ball on off, defended back to Agar.
Starc to Hope, no run length ball on sixth stump at 144 kph, Hope tries to slap this down the ground but mistimes it off the toe to Zampa at mid-off.
Starc to Hope, no run full on off, punched to mid-off.
Starc to Hope, no run good length ball on middle at 147 kph, Hope hops up to defend this into the covers.
Starc to Hope, 1 run full on middle at 147 kph, Hope flicks this into midwicket for one.
Starc to Mohammed, no run good length ball on sixth stump at 147 kph, too easy to leave alone for Mohammed.
Starc to Mohammed, no run beaten... good length ball at 145 kph angled across fourth stump, Mohammed plays at this awkwardly but it keeps moving away from his edge.
Meredith to Hope, no run good length ball on off, defended.
Meredith to Hope, no run good length ball on off at 138 kph, defended to point.
Meredith to Hope, FOUR runs good length ball on fifth stump, Hope flashes at this and gets a thick edge wide of slip through third man to the rope.
Meredith to Hope, FOUR runs goes for yorker on leg stump at 140 kph, Hope flicks this out with top class and times it well enough to the rope.

Meredith to Hope, FOUR runs goes for yorker again on middle stump at 142 kph, but misfires the length full on the stumps. Hope is not going to be breached and bunts this back through mid-on to the rope.
Meredith to Hope, no run bouncer clears Hope ducking under it easily.
Zampa to Mohammed, no run full on off, blocked out to extra cover.
Zampa to Mohammed, no run full on off, blocked back to Zampa.
Zampa to Pooran, no run good length ball on fifth stump, Pooran goes back and across to defend.
Zampa to Pooran, no run googly again on fourth stump on a good length, Pooran reads it and goes back to cut but is beaten.
Zampa to Pooran, no run another googly read by Pooran out of the hand, goes back to punch this off fifth stump but picks out backward point.
Meredith to Hope, no run good length ball outside off at 146 kph, beats Hope playing inside the line defensively.
Meredith to Hope, no run back of a length on off at 145 kph, defended to point.
Meredith to Hope, no run bouncer on fourth stump at 137 kph, Hope goes to pull and is beaten by the pace and bounce, Carey leaps and stretches with everything he has to prevent four byes.
Meredith to Hope, no run good length ball on off, defended to backward point.
Meredith to Hope, no run full on middle, defended to midwicket.

Meredith to Hope, (no ball) 2 runs full on off, punched into the gap in the covers for an easy pair to spoil a would-be maiden. And Meredith has overstepped anyway as the third umpire signals a no ball, so it's spoiled on two counts. Free hit to come.
Meredith to Hope, 1 run short on fifth stump, Hope backs away and swats this off the toe of the bat into the covers for a single to keep strike.
Zampa to Hope, 1 run good length ball on off, goes back to flick into midwicket.
Zampa to Pooran, 1 run back of a length on the legs, goes back to flick through square leg.
Zampa to Hope, no run full on the stumps, pushed back to Zampa.
Zampa to Hope, 1 run back of a length on fifth stump, punched to long-off.
Zampa to Pooran, 1 run low full toss on off stump, slapped into the covers.
Zampa to Hope, no run short on off, defended.
Meredith to Pooran, no run full on fourth stump at 146 kph, driven to mid-off.
Meredith to Pooran, no run full on off, defended to cover.
Meredith to Pooran, no run full on fourth stump, blocked to cover again.
Meredith to Pooran, no run short on the hips at 144 kph, hustles Pooran and he fends at this uncomfortably, hits him in the gloves.

Meredith to Pooran, 1 run Pooran gets away with a top-edged pull! Meredith continues to cause problems here bouncing him, Pooran goes to pull, skies this toward Starc at deep fine leg but he can't charge in fast enough to be able to get to the ball and it falls safely for one.
Meredith to Hope, 5 wide bouncer sails over leg stump, and Carey too, no chance to stop that. Goes to the rope for five wides.
Meredith to Hope, 1 run good length ball on fifth stump at 141 kph, guided with soft hands to third man.
Zampa to Hope, no run beaten! Flights this full on fifth stump at 88 kph, spins past an attempted drive.

Zampa to Hope, FOUR runs nearly a catch at mid-on! Zampa tosses this up again full on sixth stump to entice a drive, Hope heaves this flat toward Henriques but it doesn't carry to him and goes under his lunge moving left before bouncing to the rope.
Zampa to Hope, no run another flighted ball on fifth stump, Hope reaches forward awkwardly and inside edges this into the ground.
Zampa to Hope, 2 runs knee high full toss on fifth stump, punched wide of long-off for a pair.
Zampa to Hope, 1 run full on middle, reaches forward to smother this, inside edge goes through square leg.
Zampa to Pooran, no run googly lands on a good length on fourth stump, Pooran tries to follow it with his hands and is lucky not to edge it.
Turner to Hope, no run full on middle, defended back to Turner.

Turner to Hope, OUT and the decision pays off almost immediately! Turner's maiden ODI scalp on just his second ball in the format. What a gem! Turner is bowling very wide of the crease around the stumps, Hope tried to seize on the angle using his feet thinking he was protected from lbw and hitting with the spin, but Turner gets the length perfect on this delivery dragging it back a fraction with Hope telegraphing his char
Turner to Pollard, 1 run flicks his first delivery to deep midwicket
Turner to Pooran, 1 run round the wicket, full outside off, driven firmly to cover who parries it
Turner to Pollard, no run pushed back to the bowler
Turner to Pollard, 1 run worked down the ground to long-on
Zampa to Pollard, no run full at off stump, stretches forward and defends
Zampa to Holder, 1 run touch shorter, another googly, worked off the pads into square leg
Zampa to Pooran, 1 run driven off the back foot to deep cover
Zampa to Holder, no run stretched forward, an appeal for lbw, pretty sure there was bat on it. That's why short leg is lurking
Zampa to Holder, no run tossed up outside off, driven to cover
Turner to Pooran, no run round the wicket, full at middle, defended
Turner to Pooran, no run driven firmly to cover, well fielded by Marsh
Turner to Pooran, 1 run played down the ground to long-off
Turner to Holder, no run very full, pushed into the covers
Turner to Holder, 2 runs round the wicket, pushed wider outside off, Holder plays away from his body and gets a thickish outside edge towards third man
Turner to Holder, no run strides forward and defends
Zampa to Pooran, 1 run very full, driven to deep cover
Zampa to Holder, no run full at middle, defended
Zampa to Holder, 2 runs back of a length, forcing off the back foot and slides off the face wide of slip towards third man
Zampa to Holder, no run flicks a full delivery into midwicket
Zampa to Holder, 1 run a googly, takes an thick inside edge as he plays forward, trickles backward of square
Zampa to Pooran, no run excellent work by Philippe coming across from short third man to intercept a drive that slides off the face
Starc to Holder, no run over the wicket, full at off stump, 144kph, defended
Starc to Holder, 1 leg bye short of a length on leg stump, deflects backward of square
Starc to Pooran, 2 runs good length at off stump, pushed into the covers and there's a misfield which allows a second...Agar letting it through
Starc to Pooran, no run keeps it full, 140kph, Pooran getting onto the front foot as he plays to mid-off
Starc to Pooran, no run a bouncer, 146kph, he ducks
Starc to Pooran, 2 runs goes full but slips onto the pads this time, clipped in front of square
Zampa to Holder, 1 run full at middle and leg, clears his front leg and drives down to long-on
Zampa to Pooran, 1 run very full again, down the ground to long-off
Zampa to Holder, no run shorter delivery, Holder plays back and flicks into midwicket
Zampa to Holder, 1 run another one driven down the ground
Zampa to Pooran, 1 run tucked off the pads into midwicket
Zampa to Holder, 1 run sensible batting in the over as Holder drives down to long-off again
Starc to Holder, no run good length, takes a thick inside edge as he defends
Starc to Holder, 1 run full at the pads, worked to the right of mid-on
Starc to Pooran, no run picks out midwicket as he flicks this off the pads
Starc to Pooran, 1 run oops, an overthrow...the ball was nudged off the pads to square leg, Wade then hurled the return wide of the stumps and the backing up fielding
Starc to Holder, no run drives off the toe end of the bat to cover
Starc to Holder, no run back of a length outside off, 146kph, left alone
Agar to Pooran, 1 run round the wicket, full outside off, flowing drive from Pooran and a good diving save by Henriques from mid-off
Agar to Holder, 1 run good length outside off, played into backward point with an open face...confusion over the running, but the fielder tumbles as he gathers the ball
Agar to Pooran, 1 run back of a length, punched to deep cover
Agar to Holder, 1 run dabbed into the slip area
Agar to Pooran, no run short of a length outside off, playing from the back foot and comes off the bottom edge into the pitch
Agar to Pooran, no run excellent delivery, back of a length outside off and this bounces a touch more to beat the top edge as Pooran fenced at it
Marsh to Holder, no run full outside off, defended to backward point
Marsh to Holder, no run short of a length, 130kph, defended
Marsh to Holder, no run defended into the off side
Marsh to Holder, FOUR runs excellent stroke, dropped in short by Marsh, Holder sees it early and pulls through midwicket
Marsh to Holder, FOUR runs back-to-back boundaries, this is full on the pads, clipped away fine
Marsh to Holder, no run back outside off, hint of shape away, left alone
Agar to Pooran, no run stays round the wicket to the left hander, good length at off stump, defended
Agar to Pooran, no run short of a length, goes over the top edge as Pooran tries to force through the off side
Agar to Pooran, no run not far from the stumps! A short-of-a-length delivery, defended down by his feet and bounces backwards
Agar to Pooran, 1 run neatly played, a punchy drive through point to the sweeper
Agar to Holder, no run full at off stump, driven to mid-off
Agar to Holder, no run short of a length, defended and this one also bobbles backwards but isn't that close to the stumps
Marsh to Pooran, no run short of a length outside off, played into backward point
Marsh to Pooran, 1 run worked off the pads into midwicket...1000 ODI runs for Pooran
Marsh to Holder, no run full at off stump, defended
Marsh to Holder, FOUR runs edged, well wide of the keeper, down to third man...handy for West Indies. Holder coming forward, pushing away from his body just a little. Pretty safe
Marsh to Holder, no run defended into the covers
Marsh to Holder, 1 run finds the outside edge, full at off stump, along the ground to third man
Zampa to Holder, 1 run full at middle and leg, runs off an inside edge into square leg
Zampa to Pooran, no run leans well forward and defends
Zampa to Pooran, 1 run very full outside off, driven square to the point sweeper
Zampa to Holder, no run full at middle, defended
Zampa to Holder, no run slides past the inside edge as Holder plays forward and takes the pad
Zampa to Holder, no run good delivery, a sharp leg-break that also bounces as it spins past the outside edge
Marsh to Pooran, 1 run close with a direct hit! Short of a length, defended into backward point, Wade the fielder and would have been gone with a hit
Marsh to Holder, 1 run across onto off stump and tucks a short-of-length delivery to deep midwicket
Marsh to Pooran, 1 run full at off stump, driven just to the right of mid-off
Marsh to Holder, 1 run splices a pull but lands safely into midwicket around the edge of the circle
Marsh to Pooran, 1 run worked off the pads backward of square
Marsh to Holder, no run worked into midwicket, started off for the single but is sent back by Pooran
Zampa to Pooran, FOUR runs round the wicket, dragged down short, pulled powerfully through midwicket. Rare poor delivery from Zampa
Zampa to Pooran, no run full and driven to cover
Zampa to Pooran, no run dropped! Henriques at mid-off...that's a huge moment. Tossed up outside off, Pooran skims the drive straight to him and he can't hold on. Simple chance.
Zampa to Pooran, FOUR runs hammered! Tossed up again outside off, this time Pooran threads the gap with a crunching cover drive
Zampa to Pooran, no run pulls the length back and beats the outside edge
Zampa to Pooran, 2 runs short and pulled towards long-on where Starc can't prevent the second

Meredith to Holder, SIX runs clears deep square leg for six...short of a length, got underneath the pull with just enough distance. And we might have an injury here. Ben McDermott has crashed through the advertising boards
Meredith to Holder, no run short of a length at off stump, 140kph, defended to midwicket
Meredith to Holder, no run full and straight, played to mid-off
Meredith to Holder, no run another short ball and Holder is taken on the helmet as he goes for the pull...we'll have the concussion check now
Meredith to Holder, 1 run short again and this time Holder middles it nicely to deep square leg
Meredith to Pooran, 1 run 142kph, angled down to third man
Zampa to Pooran, 1 run good length on fifth stump, goes back to cut this through point for one.
Zampa to Holder, FOUR runs short on the legs, Holder picks the length early and goes back to flick a short arm jab pull behind square for four.
Zampa to Holder, FOUR runs meatball of a full toss at waist height on fourth stump, Holder swats this with disdain back to the kitchen over mid-on to the rope.

Zampa to Holder, no run googly pitches full on fourth stump, Holder prods forward, big inside edge into the pads. Bigger appeal wins Joel Wilson over... Holder goes straight to DRS. Wilson is going to pick up a golden sombrero tonight. 4 for 4 striking out on DRS decisions overturned. Little suspense in an inside edge showing up on ultraedge. Decision oveturned.
Zampa to Holder, no run googly lands short on off, goes back to pull, spins into the thigh and misses a pull. Stifled lbw shout.
Zampa to Holder, no run full on fourth stump, defended to point.
Meredith to Pooran, no run short ball over off stump, Pooran sways back.
Meredith to Pooran, 1 run back of a length on fourth stump, guided with an open face to deep third man.
Meredith to Holder, 1 wide short and tailing down the leg side, wide called.
Meredith to Holder, 1 run full on off stump, blocked in front of point, Pooran calls Holder through alertly for a sharp run.
Meredith to Pooran, 2 runs full on leg stump, tickled fine by Pooran and he hustles back to beat the relay from deep fine leg for two.
Meredith to Pooran, no run bouncer over fourth stump, left alone at 142 kph.
Meredith to Pooran, no run full on fourth stump, punched straight to cover.
Starc to Holder, no run full on middle at 142 kph, defended with a firm full face on the front foot back to Starc.
Starc to Holder, 1 run back of a length on off stump at 142 kph, guided with soft hands and an open face to deep third man.
Starc to Pooran, 1 run searching for the yorker at 145 kph, winds up darting in a knee high full toss on leg stump, flicked conservatively behind square leg for one.
Starc to Holder, no run full on off stump, defended.
Starc to Holder, no run good length ball on off at 144 kph, defended again back to Starc.
Starc to Holder, no run full on fourth stump at 143 kph, defended to point.
Turner to Pooran, no run sharp turn! Bowling again from wide of the crease around the stumps to Pooran, slants this in on off stump and rips past the edge on a forward prod.
Turner to Pooran, 1 run fuller and wider outside off, Pooran pokes this through point.
Turner to Holder, 1 run full on leg stump, Holder prods forward. Thick inside edge goes to fine leg and Pooran calls through for a tight single.
Turner to Pooran, 1 run full on fourth stump, Pooran drives flat to the point sweeper.
Turner to Holder, no run slants this flat across fifth stump on a good length, Holder tries to cut but is beaten.
Turner to Holder, no run good length ball on fourth stump, Holder winds up and then aborts his shot into an awkward defensive poke.
Starc to Pooran, no run length ball on sixth stump at 143 kph, Pooran flashes hard and is beaten.
Starc to Pooran, no run full on off stump, defended with a full face to extra cover.
Starc to Pooran, 1 run yorker on off stump at 145 kph, dug out back to Starc, who bobbles the ball in his follow-through before it bursts through his hands completely to allow a single to mid-on.
Starc to Holder, no run full and slanted into the legs, clipped to midwicket.
Starc to Holder, 1 run full and wide on sixth stump at 142 kph, punched through cover to the sweeper.
Starc to Pooran, no run pearl! Good length ball at 146 kph on fourth stump climbs on Pooran and beats his nibble outside off trying to fish a single to third man.
Turner to Holder, no run full on middle, driven back to Turner.
Turner to Holder, 2 runs full on off stump, steps away from leg to create room to carve inside out over cover and they take an easy pair.
Turner to Holder, no run good length on fourth stump, goes back to flick to midwicket.

Turner to Holder, 1 run good length on fifth stump, goes back to cut through cover and picks up his 10th ODI fifty, off 66 balls here. His last ODI fifty was also against Australia in the 2019 World Cup at Trent Bridge. West Indies famously collapsed in that match but Holder seems determined to get them over the line this time.
Turner to Pooran, no run short on the legs, goes back to pull and bottom edges into his pads.
Turner to Pooran, 2 runs short on fifth stump, rocks back to slap this through extra cover and they come back for an easy two.
Starc to Holder, no run back of a length on fifth stump at 142 kph, tries to guide this to third man but bottom edges it in front of his feet.

Starc to Holder, 2 runs fullish length ball on fourth stump, Holder spanks this on the up over mid-on for a long single, they try to come back for a tight two. A relay to the non-striker's end is a direct hit and Pooran is barely home as the ball skims off the bails on the fly.

Starc to Holder, OUT full and angled into the pads, Holder prods forward and it beats the bat clanging into the pads just above the knee roll. Big lbw shout upheld and Holder calls for DRS straight away. A lump forms in Joel Wilson's throat... This one is touch and go. And ball-tracking shows it skimming the bails. Umpire's call stays on field. Joel Wilson narrowly avoids an Audi, and Holder's innings has ended.
Starc to Joseph, no run back of a length ball on sixth stump at 144 kph, left alone.
Starc to Joseph, no run yorker tailing down leg stump, diving stop by Carey. No wide called....
Starc to Joseph, no run good length ball on off stump at 147 kph, defended confidently as Joseph shuffles in line.
Turner to Pooran, no run good length ball on fifth stump bowled wide of the crease, spins sharply to straighten and beat Pooran's cut.
Turner to Pooran, SIX runs flighted full on fifth stump, Pooran attacks with a powerful drive on one knee and clocks it high and handsome over the long-off rope, clanging into the sightscreen.
Turner to Pooran, no run good length ball on off, goes back to defend.

Turner to Pooran, 1 run dropped at slip! short on fourth stump, rocks back to cut and is cramped for room, thick edge goes to the right hand of Wade at slip. He was poorly balanced and falling over expecting the ball to come much hotter off the bat than it did. He stumbles clumsily to the ground as the ball continues off his hands behind Carey to allow Pooran a single to bring up his fifty. He was dropped at mid-off by He
Turner to Joseph, no run good length ball on off, punched to mid-off.
Turner to Joseph, no run good length ball on the legs, defended.
Starc to Pooran, 1 run good length ball on the stumps, clipped through square leg for one.
Starc to Joseph, no run wide yorker on fifth stump at 143 kph skims past Joseph's edge trying to jam it out.
Starc to Joseph, no run yorker on middle stump, jammed out back to Starc.
Starc to Joseph, 1 run bouncer on the body at 141 kph, Joseph fights this off awkwardly producing a top edge over square leg landing in no man's land for one.
Starc to Joseph, no run off stump yorker at 147 kph, Joseph blocks it out with aplomb. Starc shakes his head in frustration.
Turner to Pooran, SIX runs top-class! Floats this up too full on fifth stump, Pooran winds up and frees the arms to send this high over the extra cover rope, landing just wide of a palm tree.
Turner to Pooran, no run good length ball on fourth stump, goes back to defend.
Turner to Pooran, no run good length ball on middle, goes back to defend.
Turner to Pooran, no run fuller length on fourth stump, goes back to defend.
Turner to Pooran, 1 run full on fourth stump, drives in the air just short of Agar on the long-off rope for one.
Turner to Joseph, 5 wide good length ball spins past leg stump, Joseph's legs, and Carey's gloves. Splits leg slip too and keeps spinning away to the rope for five extras. Scores level.

Turner to Joseph, FOUR runs almighty heave ends the match in style! Joseph slams a full ball from fourth stump high and deep over midwicket bouncing into the rope. West Indies clinch a four-wicket win with 12 overs to spare. They claim 10 very significant points on the World Cup Qualifying Super League points table. The speed of the win too is significant as they'll get a healthy net run rate bump too.

West Indies move past Ireland up into a tie with Pakistan for fifth place on the Super League points table at 40 points. Pakistan have played one more match than West Indies. Australia remain in third place on 50 points, 30 points behind Bangladesh who have played 12 matches to Australia's 8 games. Come back on Monday for the series finale between these two sides. That's all for now. For Andrew McGlashan, I'm Peter Della Penna.

9.49 pm Solid chase by the hosts to claim 10 points in World Cup Qualifying on what was a very tricky wicket. Australia only have themselves to blame with some extremely sloppy fielding. Pooran was dropped twice, including the first time on 26 with the score 123 for 5 on a straightforward chance at mid-off into the lap of Moises Henriques. Pooran and Holder parlayed that extra life into a 93-run partnership and the pressure ease
West Indies won by 4 wickets (with 72 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Nicholas Pooran, WI
